bike.description: A6-SL custom-butted alloy, integrated 1 1/2" lower head tube, oversized 34.9mm seat tube & PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: XS/S (46cm), S (49cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), L/XL (61cm)

components.description: A6-SL alloy chainstays, forged road dropout w/ replaceable derailleur hanger
FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 330 aero alloy, 30mm rims, DT Swiss Champion spokes 20/24H, precision ground hubs
Oval 500 forged alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia X1 w/ FeC alloy rails
